xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/10607-Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/HZQBF7JDd2e9p4rPSbSHuWHaCC.jpg When Ashtray moves to South Central L.A. to live with his father (who appears to be the same age he is) and grandmother (who likes to talk tough and smoke reefer), he falls in with his gang-banging cousin Loc Dog, who along with the requisite pistols and Uzi carries a thermo-nuclear warhead for self-defense. Will Ashtray be able to keep living the straight life? Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood
